advisories.available: devices with Apple Neural Engine: Apple Watch Series 9 and Apple Watch Ultra 2
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to cause unexpected system shutdown
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Minghao Lin, and Ye Zhang (@VAR10CK) of Baidu Security

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause unexpected system termination
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to access user data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: An issue was addressed with improved validation of environment variables.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory protections
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher, and Joseph Ravichandran (@0xjprx) of MIT CSAIL

advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to spoof network packets
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: Prof. Benny Pinkas of Bar-Ilan University, Prof. Amit Klein of Hebrew University, and EP

advisories.impact: An app may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An attacker with physical access may be able to leak Mail account credentials
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted email may be able to initiate FaceTime calls without user authorization
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted message may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to a device may be able to view contact information from the lock screen
advisories.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management.

advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to access user data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A shortcut may output sensitive user data without consent
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Kirin (@Pwnrin), zbleet, and Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Kandji

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved environment sanitization.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.

advisories.impact: An attacker with arbitrary read and write capability may be able to bypass Pointer Authentication
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Manfred Paul (@_manfp) working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprint the user
advisories.description: The issue was addressed by adding additional logic.

advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Lukas Bernhard of CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

cves.credit: Nan Wang (@eternalsakura13) of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute

advisories.impact: A malicious attacker with arbitrary read and write capability may be able to bypass Pointer Authentication
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Manfred Paul (@_manfp) working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprint the user
advisories.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.
